item.title: BankApp
item.author: Franco Salvucci
item.description: Idea The idea came to me totally random, while I wasn’t doing a damn thing ðŸ˜‚ I saw some videos on youtube and I decided to approach this “challenge” (let’s put it in quotes because then we’ll see that it’s not a real challenge) The idea behind it is very simple, an interface (let’s call it HOME) where there are links to other interfaces: Withdrawal, Deposit, User Shows and so on…
